mutants.original_line: anagrams = {key: value for key, value in anagrams.items() if len(value) > 1}
mutants.mutated_line: anagrams = {key: value for (key, value) in anagrams.items() if len(value) >= 1}

mutants.mutated_line: anagrams = {key: value for (key, value) in anagrams.items() if len(value) != 1}

mutants.original_line: sanitized_word = "".join(char for char in word.lower() if char.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: sanitized_word = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in word.lower() if char.isalpha()))
